title: Letterhead, "Goldwyn Pictures Corporation"
inscribed:
Printed in black ink, center:  Arts Gratia Artis. Superimposed and centered over seal: Goldwyn Picture/ Corporation/ 16 East 42nd Street/New York. Below on left: Scenario Department. 

Printed in blue ink, center: The Northwestern Miller/ Minneapolis, U.S.A; printed in black ink, in belt: circulates around the world.


Printed in black ink, upper center: The Home Pattern Company/ Incorporated/ Sole Manufacturers of Patterns for/ The Ladies' Home Journal/ 18 East 18th Street/ New York.
description:
Three examples of letterhead:

Top: in black and white centered at top seal with reclining lion surrounded by banner. 

Center: seal with blue globe showing the Americas. Gold rays surround the globe as well as a a belt. 

Bottom: name of enterprise and mailing information at upper center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "Goldwyn Pictures Corporation".
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1997-131-14.
